alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 11:28PM CDT until July 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR MCPHERSON...SOUTHEASTERN RICE AND NORTHWESTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 1128 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wilsey to near Tampa to 7 miles southwest of Windom, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...50 to 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Sterling, Galva, Canton, Little River, Ramona, Windom, Durham, Tampa, Lost Springs, Mcpherson Airport and Roxbury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
